backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping frontend files to implemented branding and favicon updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing high-level summaries of major frontend components, styles, configuration, and sections.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and required asset checks for publishing the site to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including metadata, OG tags, encoded favicon references, and font preconnects.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the site layout by rendering header, footer, and all main content sections in order.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component displaying branding, quick links, and contact details with URLs from shared config.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Fixed header with scroll-aware styling, logo, smooth-scroll navigation, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section showing four capabilities using icon cards with brief descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Section displaying four benefit items in a responsive grid with simple icon-based cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Displays carpet collections with random thumbnails selected on mount and renders feature tags for each.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders contact cards and call-to-action buttons using shared CONTACT config values.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Provides a filterable image gallery with modal viewing and error handling for failed image loads.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a hero banner with background image and buttons that scroll to gallery or contact sections.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports centralized phone, email, and location details for site-wide contact usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds a fully encoded asset URL using the base path and encoded path segments.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme settings, colors, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file defining project metadata, existing features, and a pending feature request related to using an uploaded asset as the site logo.
